title: Coaching Strategies to Improve Feedback Effectiveness for Pre-Service Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics pedagogy, foundational teaching experience as a pre-service educator
context.additional_context: A course designed to enhance the ability to provide short-term feedback in mobile learning environments using digital devices. It enables pre-service teachers to effectively deliver coaching feedback on student thinking strategies.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can explain concrete and actionable methods for providing feedback on eliciting student thinking strategies.
Learners develop a proactive attitude toward engaging in professional development activities to enhance the quality of coaching feedback.
Learners evaluate the ability to align feedback focus with core instructional behaviors through analysis of actual classroom videos.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
